name: Flownight
description:
In a parallel universe, A sunflower that dies from being exposed to light ,tries to become a  بزر عباد شمس (parallel universe..remember? :P) by reaching a factory at the end of the road. can it make it ?

-First Level [night mode]  : The goal is to reach the factory at the end. you have to collect items that will protect you from sun-light in the Second Level  but you have to be aware from any light such as street light, cars.. etc.

-Second Level [ daylight ] :                                                                                                                            keep in the shadows of trees ,avoid sunlight ,use your items

How To Play 

Controls : W-A-D (you can't move backwards) space : use Item  , switching items by mouse clicking on the arrows

collecting items  : [maximum 3 items] but you can collect different amount of each one. i.e.: 10 umbrella's in 1 slot -Note : you can't Replace an item !

-Note : Light Bulbs damage you even when they are turned off when stepping under them. you click the [USE] button to use the item, some items needs time to be used
